fields.title: LinkedIn Job Listing
fields.description: Data extracted from LinkedIn job listings

id.title: Job ID
id.description: Unique identifier for the LinkedIn job listing

companyName.title: Company Name
companyName.description: Name of the company posting the job

postedAt.title: Posted Date
postedAt.description: ISO formatted date when the job was posted

employment_type.title: Employment Type
employment_type.description: Type of employment (Full-time, Part-time, Contract, etc.)

seniority_level.title: Seniority Level
seniority_level.description: Seniority level of the position (Entry level, Mid-Senior level, etc.)

easyApply.title: Easy Apply
easyApply.description: Whether the job has LinkedIn's Easy Apply feature enabled

link.title: Job URL
link.description: URL to the job listing on LinkedIn

companyLinkedinUrl.title: Company LinkedIn URL
companyLinkedinUrl.description: URL to the company's LinkedIn profile

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: List of skills mentioned in the job description

descriptionText.title: Job Description
descriptionText.description: Full text of the job description

scraped_at.title: Scraped At
scraped_at.description: ISO formatted date when the job was scraped

jobWorkplaceTypes.title: Workplace Types
jobWorkplaceTypes.description: Types of workplace settings (Remote, On-site, Hybrid)

localizedName.description: Localized name of the workplace type

insights.title: Insights
insights.description: LinkedIn insights about connections related to the job

companyLogo.title: Company Logo
companyLogo.description: URL to the company's logo image

applyUrl.title: Apply URL
applyUrl.description: URL to apply for the job (may be external to LinkedIn)

isReposted.title: Is Reposted
isReposted.description: Whether the job has been reposted

posterId.title: Poster ID
posterId.description: ID of the person who posted the job

isPromoted.title: Is Promoted
isPromoted.description: Whether the job listing is promoted/sponsored

jobState.title: Job State
jobState.description: Current state of the job listing (ACTIVE, CLOSED, etc.)

contentSource.title: Content Source
contentSource.description: Source of the job listing content

companySlogan.title: Company Slogan
companySlogan.description: Slogan or tagline of the company

companyEmployeesCount.title: Company Employees Count
companyEmployeesCount.description: Number of employees at the company

jobApplicantInsights.title: Job Applicant Insights
jobApplicantInsights.description: Insights about job applicants (varies based on available data)

company.title: Company Details
company.description: Detailed information about the company (varies based on available data)

salary.title: Salary Information
salary.description: Salary information if available (varies based on available data)

recruiter.title: Recruiter Information
recruiter.description: Information about the recruiter if available (varies based on available data)

views.title: LinkedIn Job Listings
views.description: Data extracted from LinkedIn job postings
